column4: Is there a way to make it so that files created in directory are owned by the owner of the directory?
and you may need to make it recursive ... sudo chown -R owner directory
what I mean is I have a directory with owner dirguy:dirguys and a user userguy who belongs to dirguys group.  When userguy creates a file in dirguys I want the owner of that file to be dirguy:dirguys
